thread.title: Atletico Madrid want Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez to replace Manchester United transfer target Antoine Griezmann
thread.title_full: Atletico Madrid want Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez to replace Manchester United transfer target Antoine Griezmann

author: Steve Stammers
title: Atletico Madrid want Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez to replace Manchester United transfer target Antoine Griezmann
text:
Sport Atletico Madrid want Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez to replace Manchester United transfer target Antoine Griezmann Diego Simeone reckons the Chilean is ideal to replace forward being strongly linked with summer move to Old Trafford Share Arsenal and Sanchez saw their slim title hopes fade even further on Saturday (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Alexis Sanchez is a £60million target for Atletico Madrid. 
Arsenal star Sanchez has been identified by Atletico boss Diego Simeone as the man to replace Antoine Griezmann, who is expected to sign for Manchester United in the summer. 
Forward Sanchez ’s present deal runs out at the end of next season, but if no agreement is reached with the 28-year-old - who cost £32million from Barcelona in the summer of 2014 - then the Gunners will cash in on one of their prize assets. Atletico star Griezmann is widely expected to make a mega-money move to Man United (Photo: AFP) 
And the alarming slump in form that has seen Arsenal slip out of the title race for another season has not helped the situation. 
France international Griezmann will cost United around £90million – and is a player long admired by Reds boss Jose Mourinho. 
If the Special One gets his man, then Simeone wants Sanchez. He admires the battling qualities that Sanchez brings to a team and his appetite for football. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
